name: Ext_R2_QuestionnaireResponse_encounter
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.QuestionnaireResponse.encounter for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents QuestionnaireResponse.encounter from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/QuestionnaireResponse|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Primary encounter during which the answers were collected
element.definition: Encounter during which this set of questionnaire response were collected. When there were multiple encounters, this is the one considered most relevant to the context of the answers.
element.comment: `QuestionnaireResponse.context` maps to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.encounter`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EpisodeOfCare)` has no mapping So is mapped as RelatedTo.
